name: Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge + Concealer Sponge Duo, Makeup Blending Sponges For Foundation & Concealer, Offers Light To Medium Coverage, Natural, Dewy Makeup, Latex-Free Foam 2 Count
short_description: The Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge + Concealer Sponge Duo bring together the iconic MCS for a dewy base and the Miracle Concealer Sponge for a lifted finish
Includes: (1) Miracle Concealer Sponge and (1) Miracle Complexion Sponge
This makeup sponge set, AKA your dewy skin staples, provides light to medium coverage
Our Miracle Complexion Sponge and Miracle Concealer Sponge can both be used with liquid and cream formulas
Both makeup blending sponges are best used damp for a dewy look
The small precision tip and elongated shape on our concealer sponge allows for precise application under the eyes and around the nose
product_description: The Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge + Concealer Sponge Duo is key for a seamless natural, dewy finish and targeted precision application. The makeup sponge set includes our best-selling Miracle Complexion Sponge and our NEW Miracle Concealer Sponge. Use the Miracle Complexion Sponge to apply your all over base and the Miracle Concealer Sponge to conceal blemishes - a full face done by two sponges! The Miracle Complexion Sponge works best with liquid and cream formulas such as foundation, skin tints, and illuminators. The Miracle Concealer Sponge works best with both liquid and cream concealers. Both makeup sponges have RT’s unique 3-point application technique that makes blending products seamless. First use the flat edge of the sponge to apply product, then the precision tip to conceal and perfect, and finally, blend it all out with the rounded side. Use the makeup blending sponges damp for extra dewiness. Both are easy to clean using our Real Techniques Brush + Sponge Cleansing Gel. They’re also 100% cruelty-free, vegan, and designed with revolutionary latex-free foam technology. We are Real Techniques, the brand of choice for all makeup users, no matter your level of expertise. Created in collaboration with leading makeup artists, we aspire to take the mystery out of choosing beauty tools so you can focus more time on putting your best face forward one blend at a time. From full makeup looks, to quick beauty hacks, RT brushes + sponges are exceptionally high quality for professional looking results every time. BUT… don’t be fooled by our affordable prices, RT tools are award-winning + purposefully designed because that’s what you deserve. Quality without compromise.
